description:
Imports: Volume

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
51000 Foreign trade

Definition:
The volume of imports is obtained by multiplying the
quantity of imports of the reference month (per commodity
code and group of countries) with the relevant unit value of
the base year (per commodity code and group of countries).
The base unit values required are obtained by dividing the
actual values of the base year (per commodity code and group
of countries) by the related import quantities.
The volume indicates how large imports would have been in
the reference period if the unit values of the base year had
remained unchanged.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Imports: Volume
